<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>public</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.CatalogRecurringPriceCalculator</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description>If this script include is modified to customize price calculation then the following property: glide.sc.use_custom_pricegenerator must be set to: true</description> <name>CatalogRecurringPriceCalculator</name> <script><![CDATA[// If this script include is modified to customize price calculation then the following property: glide.sc.use_custom_pricegenerator must be set to: true var CatalogRecurringPriceCalculator = Class.create();
CatalogRecurringPriceCalculator.prototype = Object.extendsObject(CatalogPriceCalculator, { initialize : function(/* GlideRecord */ gr) { this.cpc = new SNC.CatalogRecurringPriceCalculator(gr); },
calcPrice : function() { return this.cpc.calcPrice(); } });]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2012-10-08 11:40:39</sys_created_on> <sys_id>756351003701300054b6a3549dbe5dda</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>CatalogRecurringPriceCalculator</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Service Catalog Platform" source="com.glideapp.servicecatalog.platform">6d218d0f6d2620100acb70b35343303c</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_756351003701300054b6a3549dbe5dda</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-02-14 11:34:12</sys_updated_on> <u_script_length>476</u_script_length> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
